summary:
This is my first mod, based loosely on the tutorial walkthrough. :) If there are any issues, let me know.
The location of this player home is a bit west to Riverwood, you cant miss it if you fast travel there.


Many thanks to Bethseda for creating this awesome game.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, based loosely on the tutorial walkthrough. :) If there are any issues, let me know.
The location of this player home is a bit west to Riverwood, you cant miss it if you fast travel there.

Anyone is free to use/modify this as long as you mention me in the credits. ;)

Many thanks to Bethseda for creating this awesome game.


##############
I\'m not sure if I will be updating this-I probably won\'t add anything else apart from fixing bugs.
Let me know if there are any problems and I will try my best to fix them. Since this is my first mod, I didnt have the time to make or add navmeshes. 

And yes, I like my wine and cheese, as you can tell in the mod!! :)
author: Novos999
